description:
Shigamine surprises everyone by teaming up with Kazane to battle Kemura and an evil Captain Answer. Kazane struggles with her guilt, while Shigamine learns what it truly means to be a hero. Tasuku uncovers the truth about Suzaku, Sophia, and Kyoya Gaen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キャプテン・アンサー"オーバーロード"の反逆!!
